feed.title: North Mountain (Cape Breton) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 6:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Temperature: -7.5°C
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: WNW 39 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over the Highlands overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the evening then increasing to 60 gusting to 80 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Windy. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
